backend/main.mo: Primary Motoko canister defining user roles, profiles, stores, products, orders, reviews, and auth/storage mixins with role checks and state maps.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new format by adding userId and nextUserId while preserving other fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing their purpose and key behaviors.
frontend/.gitattributes: Marks various binary file types as binary to avoid Git corruption and diffing issues.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Git ignore rules for Android build outputs, IDE files, and generated assets.
frontend/android/app/build.gradle: Android Gradle config setting app metadata, build settings, dependencies, and a task to copy web assets into the app.
frontend/android/app/src/main/AndroidMan: Android manifest defining app permissions, main activity, launcher settings, and deep link intent filters for auth.
frontend/android/app/src/main/assets/www: Placeholder file ensuring the assets directory is committed.
frontend/android/app/src/main/java/com/p: Android activity hosting a WebView with custom auth handling, deep link support, and local web asset loading.
Handles deciding when to open URLs externally, detecting app return deep links, and launching Chrome Custom Tabs with fallback.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/drawab: Defines a white splash screen with the app launcher icon centered.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/layout: Layout containing a full‑screen WebView used by the Android app.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/mipmap: Round adaptive launcher icon using the same background and foreground assets.
Adaptive launcher icon specifying white background and foreground asset.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/values: Defines the app name string resource.
App theme configuring a splash screen background and disabling title/action bar.
frontend/android/build.gradle: Top‑level Gradle build configuration including Kotlin and Android Gradle plugins.
frontend/android/gradle.properties: Gradle settings enabling AndroidX, JVM args, and Kotlin code style.
frontend/android/gradle/wrapper/gradle-w: Configures the Gradle wrapper to use Gradle 8.2.
frontend/android/settings.gradle: Defines repositories, project name, and includes the app module.
frontend/docs/android-apk-build.md: Documentation on prerequisites and steps for building the Android APK.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for the web frontend.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/scripts/build-android-apk-debug: PowerShell script building the web app, assembling a debug APK, validating it, and publishing it to assets.
Shell script performing web build, debug APK creation, integrity checks, and asset publishing.
frontend/scripts/stage-android-apk-asset: PowerShell script verifying or building the APK, then ensuring APK and metadata are staged for deployment.
Shell script that checks for an existing APK, builds if needed, then validates and stages APK and metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, authentication state checks, and conditional dialogs for profile setup, PIN, unlock, and biometrics.
frontend/src/components/admin/TermsManag: Provides an admin interface to view, edit, and publish legal documents including terms and privacy policy.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied page with navigation and logout options, tailored for admin and non-admin routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/BiometricEn: Shows a dialog for enabling biometric authentication, handling setup, cancellation, and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/FactoryRese: Prompts users to confirm a full application reset by typing a phrase and handles validation and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/PinSetupDia: Guides users through creating and confirming a 4‑digit PIN, with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Form dialog for creating a user profile, handling validation, role selection, super-admin bootstrapping, and saving data via mutations.
frontend/src/components/auth/UnlockDialo: Unlock screen supporting biometric authentication and PIN fallback with error handling and automatic biometric attempts.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout providing navigation, language selection, theming, and logout handling based on user role.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Context provider managing theme state, syncing it to localStorage, and resolving system or explicit light/dark modes.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Button component that toggles the current theme between light and dark.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
Detects Android WebView and wraps login with Android-specific handling and error messaging.
frontend/src/hooks/useBiometricAuth.ts: Manages enabling and verifying WebAuthn-based biometric authentication with storage of credential IDs and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks to manage Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalPin.ts: Implements PIN storage and verification using hashed localStorage values with session-based unlock state managed through a reactive store.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for user profiles, admin bootstrap flows, terms content, and factory reset operations.
frontend/src/i18n/LanguageProvider.tsx: Defines a language context with English/French translations, persists language selection, and exposes a translation function.
frontend/src/i18n/translations/en.ts: English translation dictionary containing UI strings for common actions, navigation, dashboards, and forms.
frontend/src/i18n/translations/fr.ts: French translation dictionary mirroring the English keys for UI text and application flows.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with CSS variables defining color themes for light and dark modes and shared layout tokens.
frontend/src/legal/providedLegalText.ts: Exports static customer and store-owner legal terms strings for PrimePost.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Admin dashboard showing store, customer, order stats, revenue, analytics, and store block/unblock controls.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Admin settings page displaying a panel to manage legal terms and privacy policies.
frontend/src/pages/auth/RoleLoginPage.ts: Handles role-based login, super-admin bootstrap flow, Android auth bridge, and factory reset actions.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CartPage.tsx: Shows cart items grouped by store with quantity controls, totals, and navigation to checkout or stores.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CheckoutPage: Manages checkout flow including order submission, payment method selection, biometrics or PIN verification.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerDash: Displays a customer dashboard with navigational action cards linking to store access, search, marketplace, cart, and orders.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerSett: Loads and edits the user's profile, allowing updates to name, phone, and email with save and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/customer/MarketplaceP: Shows marketplace products with search, category filter, sorting, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrderDetailP: Displays detailed information for a selected order including items, status, store info, and payment details.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Lists the user's active and completed orders with tabs and navigation to order details.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreAccessP: Allows users to enter a store ID and navigate to that store’s page.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreDetailP: Shows store details, ratings, and product list with add‑to‑cart support and handling for loading or missing stores.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreSearchP: Lists all stores with search and category filtering and navigates to selected store pages.
frontend/src/pages/owner/InventoryPage.t: Manages store products with create, edit, delete, and image upload inside a dialog form.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OrdersManagemen: Displays store orders grouped by status and allows updating each order’s status.
Shows owner’s stores with navigation to inventory, orders, and settings and allows registering new stores.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerSettingsPa: Allows owners to view and edit their profile information with validation and save actions.
frontend/src/pages/owner/StoreRegistrati: Provides a form to create a new store with name, category, location, and mobile money details.
frontend/src/pages/owner/StoreSettingsPa: Store settings page that loads store data, lets owners edit fields, and submits updates via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/public/ApkDownloadPag: Public page that fetches APK metadata, validates the deployed APK, and shows download or error states.
frontend/src/pages/terms/PrivacyPolicyPa: Loads and displays the privacy policy content with fallback UI when unavailable.
frontend/src/pages/terms/TermsAcceptance: Displays terms content, allows users to accept it, and records acceptance before redirecting.
frontend/src/state/cartStore.ts: Zustand store managing per‑store shopping carts with add, remove, update, and total‑calculation logic.
frontend/src/state/pinSessionStore.ts: In‑tab reactive store tracking PIN setup and unlock state using memory plus browser storage.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Utility functions aggregating order data into daily, weekly, and monthly revenue statistics.
frontend/src/utils/apkIntegrity.ts: Fetches and validates APK metadata and deployed APK headers to detect incorrect or HTML responses.
frontend/src/utils/geolocation.ts: Provides geolocation access, distance calculation, and parsing of coordinate strings.
frontend/src/utils/logout.ts: Implements centralized logout and factory-reset cleanup, clearing identity, caches, storage, and navigation state.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Formats prices and computes effective prices and line totals using bigint arithmetic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/userProfile.ts: Generates display names and initials from a UserProfile object.
frontend/src/utils/webauthn.ts: Provides WebAuthn availability checks and helpers for creating and retrieving credentials.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, architecture, requirements, and existing features for a bilingual Flutter-based POS/marketplace app. Contains role definitions, sequential ID rules, security requirements, and tracked implemented features.
